entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 30. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 30 April 2023
